clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the prevention of liver damage and kidney damage associated with overdoses of acetaminophen

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Due to this ability to undergo redox reactions cysteine has antioxidant properties Cysteine is an important source of sulfur in human metabolism and although it is classified as a non essential amino acid cysteine may be essential for infants the elderly and individuals with certain metabolic disease or who suffer from malabsorption syndromes Cysteine may at some point be recognized as an essential or conditionally essential amino acid
